code:
flowchart LR
  %% User-perspective flow, feature-driven, no technical endpoints
  subgraph Start["Getting Started"]
    L["Open App"]
    S["Sign In / Create Account"]
  end

  subgraph Plan["Plan Interview"]
    P1["Choose Role"]
    P2["Set Experience Level"]
    P3["Pick Technologies / Topics"]
    P4["Create Practice Session"]
  end

  subgraph Practice["Practice"]
    Q["View Suggested Questions"]
    A1["Answer by Typing"]
    A2["Answer by Speaking"]
    H["Hints / Tips (optional)"]
  end

  subgraph Feedback["Feedback & Insights"]
    F1["See Suggested Answers"]
    F2["Get Skill Feedback"]
    F3["Speech Insights: pace, pauses, fillers"]
    F4["Overall Score & Recommendations"]
  end

  subgraph Iterate["Iterate & Improve"]
    I1["Retry Questions"]
    I2["Save Session & Track Progress"]
    I3["Share or Export Summary (optional)"]
  end

  L --> S --> P1 --> P2 --> P3 --> P4 --> Q
  Q --> A1
  Q --> A2
  A1 --> H
  A2 --> H
  H --> F1
  A1 --> F1
  A2 --> F1
  F1 --> F2 --> F3 --> F4
  F4 --> I1 --> Q
  F4 --> I2
  I2 --> I3
